name: Mohair Pouffe with Walnut Plinth - Almond
description: Introducing the Mohair Pouffe with Walnut Plinth - Almond, handmade in our workshop in England. This compact pouffe is the perfect layering piece, designed to add an unexpected touch of luxury to your space. The luxuriously soft mohair velvet is complemented by the rich and inviting walnut plinth. An ideal cosy update for your space. The pouffe is the perfect addition to a cosy nook, ideal to be used as extra seating for unexpected guests or as a luxurious foot rest.
